schools.name: Elton M Garrett Junior High School

data.description: This beautiful open floor plan offers 3 large bedrooms with a bonus room in the back!! The covered patio leads to a large yard with a pool (drained and covered). There have been updates made throughout including a newer kitchen & baths. Also included is RV parking off the alley way. The home needs a little TLC but has so much potential!
